lines.text: I am Lobo. I hunt alone. I need no one.
Spirits for the spirits.
Well it will all be history soon anyway. At five o' clock sharp, when he leaves his place on Caleechie Drive. 909 Caleechie Drive.
And now, ladies and gentleman, the one the only microwave lounge singer!
Oh great, look at this. Hungry Man, cup o' soup, cup o' stew, cop o' noodles...
Do you mind not indexing my garbage?
What's this?
Oh please, by all means, review my mail.
Get well cards?
When you're through, my diary is upstairs.
What's your daughters name?
Annabelle. Or piglet, mostly piglet.

No! Annabelle! Don't play with the space heater coil. Piglet, if you breath gas it will tie up all your available hemoglobin and there will be none left for oxygen transfer. Your lips and nail beds will turn cherry red and you'll die of carbon monoxide poisoning. I like to acquaint her with consequences.

[Takes Lobo's totem necklace from Emily]
Baby cakes what is this?
It's nothing I found it.
Oh, I like it. Let me have it. For an engagement present.
Correct me if I'm wrong but isn't the man supposed to give the woman an engagement present? Something in the form of a ring?
Gay? Diseased? Married... ugh!
Emily.
Lobo!
I have something to tell you...
Are you gay?
Gay? No, I am not...
Great! Are you free of disease?
I've got an ingrown toenail, but, Emily I am...
Don't talk. That's all I wanted to know. God help me, I don't care if you're married. I know that you're leaving, I know we'll only have this one night but I want it Lobo. I want the memories.
Emily... I...
[Emily proceeds to kiss him interrupting his words]
